retrieval.dist

Class ResultsSimilarities

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.dist.ResultsSimilarities

  • public class ResultsSimilarities
extends java.lang.Object
    A result object which contains: -A list of ordered similar pictures -A list of server state -Total number of pictures indexed on all server (available)

      • trimSimilarities

        public void trimSimilarities(int k)
        Get only the k first similar pictures Each server s (from S servers) will send (max) k similar pictures. ResultSim structure will contains max S*k results. This function just keep max k first items
        Parameters:
        k - K
